channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP SE -- SAP Process Integration - Rest Adapter (SAP_XIAF)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP SE -- SAP Process Integration - Rest Adapter (SAP_XIAF)

item.title: CVE-2020-6305|2024-08-04T08:55:22.450Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20process%20integration%20-%20rest%20adapter%20%28sap_xiaf%29
item.description: PI Rest Adapter of SAP Process Integration (update provided in SAP_XIAF 7.31, 7.40, 7.50) does not sufficiently encode user-controlled inputs, resulting in Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability.
